sections.heading: of deserters.It shall be lawful for any civil officer having authority to apprehend offenders under the laws of the State of Nebraska summarily to apprehend a deserter from the Nebraska National Guard or a member of the military forces absent without leave and deliver him into the custody of the Neb
sections.text: of deserters.It shall be lawful for any civil officer having authority to apprehend offenders under the laws of the State of Nebraska summarily to apprehend a deserter from the Nebraska National Guard or a member of the military forces absent without leave and deliver him into the custody of the Nebraska National Guard.SourceLaws 1969, c. 458, ยง 10, p. 1556.
